description: The government is seeking proposals for a wide-ranging RFSA to meet their future needs for video production services.
tags: Radio Frequency Services Association, RFSA, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Video production REFRESH - 2 ]
full_summary:
### RFSA for Audiovisual Services
**EN578-220462-WS3062757920 Refresh -2**
#### Notice Type
Request for Supply Arrangement (RSFA) for Audiovisual Services
#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding
#### Contract Type
Supply Arrangement (SA)
#### UNSPSC Codes
* Video Production Services (82131603)
#### Regions of Opportunity
None
#### Regions of Delivery
Canada
#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
#### Contractor Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact: Marc Roussel, marc.roussel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17758885?extsite=MTc3NTg4ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Publication Date:** 2023-10-18
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-08T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Supply Arrangement (RSFA) for audiovisual services. The purpose of this RFSA is to establish a Supply Arrangement (SA) that will provide the Government of Canada with a stable source of audiovisual services.

The RFSA is seeking proposals for video production services, including the creation, editing, and delivery of high-quality audio-visual content. Suppliers must meet the specified requirements, including but not limited to:

- Provide high-quality audiovisual services that meet the Government of Canada's standards
- Meet the requirements outlined in the RFSA document
- Comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards

The RFSA will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

- Variations or combinations of the above methods
- Meeting the specified requirements outlined in the RFSA document
- Complying with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards

The deadline for the tender closing date is 2023-11-08T14:00:00. Suppliers should ensure that their proposals are submitted prior to the closing date to be considered. Suppliers can submit their proposals electronically via the procurement portal listed in the notice URL.

By participating in this RFSA, suppliers will be able to provide high-quality audiovisual services to the
